page.title: 12AMENITIES-continued
page.content: 9.BETHESDA-THIS IS A HALL OWNED BY MR POWELL ON CHURCH STREET.OWNED BY THE CHURCH AND IS USED FOR SUNDAY SCHOOL EVERY SUNDAY. 10.COMMUNITY CENTRE/YOUTH CLUB. THIS IS THE HALL ATTACHED TO HOLT SCHOOL.IT IS OWNED BY CLWYD COUNTY COUNCIL AND IS ONLY AVAILABLE BY BOOKING. 11.CHAPEL-CHAPEL LANE 12.GREENS-a)SMITHFIELD GREEN -b)BOWLING GREEN -c)THE GREEN 13.CEMETRY-THIS IS ON GREEN STREET BEHIND THE BOWLING GREEN. 14.ALLOTTMENTS-THESE ARE ON GREEN STRRET BY THE CEMETRY. ALL OF THESE AMENITIES ARE IN HOLT SO AS YOU CAN SEE IT IS NOT SUCH A SMALL VILLAGE.
